entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
